name: Let's have a cup of coffee, get to know each other and talk about music!
how_to_find_us: Let's meet upstairs at Exki (la Bourse). See you there!

name: Get connected with other musicians in Brussels!

description: Hello everyone. Please come and hang out with us on Tuesday the 23rd at "de Belmonte". Feel free to invite other musicians to join us. Hope to see you there!
name: Connect with other musicians in Brussels!
Come and connect with other musicians in Brussels!

description: Hi all, unfortunately I missed the recent musicians' meeting. If there's enough interest, I'll be glad to organize one in a couple of weeks. Let me know in your comments!

venue.name: Old Oak Irish Pub and Restaurant

name: Musicians meet and greet and chat

description: We'll meet upstairs at Exki, Bourse. Hope to see you there!
name: Let's get together again!

description:
This will be a very special time for our musician's meetup. You will not want to miss it! We will meet in the cafe area at Novanois rehearsal studios. It's an incredible place with a great vibe. You'll have a chance to connect with other musicians and this time you'll even be able to share a song or jam so be sure and bring your instrument! Looking forward to seeing you all there. Bring a friend!

check out Novanois!  Rehearsal Studios - novanois

See you soon!

David
name: Come and meet other musicians and share your music.

description:
Our last meetup at Novanois was great! This time let's make it even bigger and better. Invite your friends! Come share your music and connect with other musicians here in Brussels!!

Musician's Meetup

This will be a very special time for our musician's meetup. You will not want to miss it! We will meet in the cafe area at Novanois rehearsal studios. It's an incredible place with a great vibe. You'll have a chance to connect with other musicians and share a song or jam so be sure and bring your instrument! All styles of music are welcome but it will be primarily an acoustic setting Bring a friend! check out Musician's Meetup  www.meetup.com/Musicians-Meetup/ check out Novanois  www.novanois.com Looking forward to seeing you all there.
name: Musician's Meetup Open Mic Night at Novanois!

description:
The Vox Pop choir performs hits from varied genres; rock, gospel, musical theatre all the way to classic favourites. No prior experience is required - just the spirit to succeed.

Vox Pop will re-launch this semester with an afternoon of singing and socialising in a fun, friendly, but focused atmosphere. The event is free - the aim is to come along and see what we do, put together a fun song and perform it at the end with some drinks and chats thrown in!
name: Vox Pop Choir Relaunch Party

description:
Last time we were at Novanois it was an incredible night. Many of you came and shared your music and connected with other musicians. Let's do it again. If you haven't joined us yet, please come! It is exciting to see this music community of Brussels growing!

If you would like to perform, please place your name on the OPEN MIC LIST in the comments section below. We will probably have to limit each person to 2 songs. 

See you there!
name: Are you ready? It's Musician's Meetup - Open Mic time again! Sign up to play..

description:
Musician's Meetup is growing! Something special is happening! Here's your chance to get to know other musicians in Brussels and share your music.

Singer/Songwriters - sign up to share a song or two. 

Instrumentalists - stay for the late night Jam session. 

This is going to be great! See you there......
name: Open Mic and Jam Session at Aloft Hotel, Schuman!

description:
It's time for another Musician's Meetup Open Mic Night at Aloft Hotel, Schuman! Get to know other musicians and share your music in a very cool lounge with a great atmosphere! Looking forward to starting the year with music!

Thanks for making all of the meetups this past year a success. It's been a blast.....and we're just getting started!

Merry Christmas to you all and may you all have a wonderful 2014!

Hope to see you all on the 16th!

David
name: Start the New Year with a Musician's Meetup Open Mic at Aloft Hotel

description:
Hello! It has been a long time since we have had a meetup without open mic and jam session. This will be an opportunity for all of us to connect with each other which is sometimes difficult to do during open mic. Please come and hang out with us at Cafe Des Halles, a very cool place! 

Bring a friend! See you there!

David
name: Come to Cafe Des Halles and connect with other musicians!

description: These are exciting times for musician's meetup. Our group is really growing! Come and join us for another great night of music at the Aloft Hotel! Get to know other musicians and share your music in a very cool lounge with a great atmosphere!
name: Open Mic and Jam Session at Aloft Hotel, Schuman!

description:
So sorry about last week. Please join us this Wednesday night at the Aloft at 7:30pm. Come and share a song or two during Open Mic or participate in the Jam Session, or both!! Bring a friend and introduce them to this growing community of musicians! 

See you there! 

David
name: RESCHEDULED! Open Mic and Jam Session at Aloft Hotel, Schuman!

description: Yes!  Another opportunity to connect with other musicians in Brussels and share your music. Come and join us! Thursday, March 20th, 7:30pm at Aloft Hotel, Schuman.  Bring a friend!
name: Musician's Meetup - Open Mic and Jam Session!

description: Come and connect with other musicians in Brussels and share your music! Join us for our monthly Open Mic & Jam Session, April 17th at the Aloft Hotel, Schuman at 7:30pm. Hope to see you there!
name: Open Mic and Jam Session! April 17 at Aloft, Schuman

description: Hello! I wanted to go ahead and announce our meetup for the month of May. Our last one was great! Here is yet another opportunity to jump in and get connected with other musicians in Brussels and let your music be heard! Please join us and bring a friend! Thurs, May 15th, 7:30pm at Aloft Hotel, Schuman.
name: Open Mic and Jam Session! May 15 at Aloft, Schuman

description:
Hello everyone! 

For the summer, we have decided to return to the place where Musician's Meetup Open Mic and Jam Session began....Novanois! So sorry we couldn't meet in June, but now we are just a few weeks away from another great opportunity to connect with other musicians and share our music with others!


Let's make this a great night. Bring your friends.

See you there!

David
name: It's Open Mic & Jam Session time again!!

description: Come and join your fellow musicians and music lovers for another Open Mic and Jam Session. Hope to see you there!
name: Musician's Meetup Open Mic and Jam Session! Tuesday September 2nd at Novanois!

description:
It's time to get together again! Come connect with other musicians and share your music! It's an exciting time as the group continues to grow. 

****We will be at Novanois again but this time we really need to try and move things back toward the acoustic approach we had in the earlier days of our meetup. The space where we've been meeting at Novanois is really not appropriate for large bands, full drum set, multiple electric guitars, etc... Also, with larger groups, the transitions between each act become quite long.

However....we are working with Muriel at Novanois to begin a new additional event in the larger space upstairs for bands and larger groups with a more electric approach. We will be announcing more details very soon!

Please continue to come to the acoustic event as well. It is always good to get together. Sometimes it's a fun challenge to present an "unplugged" version of something quite edgy.

**If you are planning on participating in the "open mic" please list your name here. Each artist can share two songs and then if there is more time there will be more opportunities later in the evening.

I look forward to seeing you all there.


David
name: Musician' Meetup Open Mic and Jam Session

description:
Our meetup at Novanois was fantastic! Please come again to our next event on Wednesday, October 22 at the Aloft hotel, Schuman.

If you would like to share a song or two during "open mic" please list your name here.

I'm sure it will be a great night! 

David
name: Open Mic and Jam Session! October 22 at Aloft, Schuman

description: Hello everyone! Please join us for the next Musician's meetup open mic and jam session on Thursday, November 20th at 7:30pm at the Aloft hotel, Schuman. If you would like to share a song or two during "open mic" please list your name here. We're looking forward to seeing you all there! David. Myles and Solomon
name: Open Mic and Jam Session at Aloft Hotel, Schuman Nov. 20th  7:30pm
